description: This source file defines the HomeFragment class, which extends BrowseSupportFragment to create a user interface for browsing a list of fitness-related cards. It sets up the UI, populates rows with sample cards, and handles user interactions, such as navigating to dietary preferences.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: Main class representing the fragment that shows a list of fitness feature cards in a TV app UI, allowing navigation to other screens.

methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of HomeFragment.

methods.description: Overrides the fragment's lifecycle method to initialize UI setup and row creation.

methods.description: Sets up the visual aspects of the fragment, including title and colors.

methods.description: Creates and populates the row of feature cards displayed to the user.
